question: What is the theme of the World Food Safety Day (WFSD) 2020?
explanation:
The World Food Safety Day (WFSD) is celebrated on June 7, 2020. This year is the second edition of the Food Safety Day. The day is celebrated to promote global food safety awareness and to bring together countries, civil society and private firms to take required action.
World Health Organisation (WHO) is collaboration with the Food and Agriculture Organization leads the member states to celebrate Food Safety Day. This year, the theme of WFSD campaign is “Food safety, everyone’s business”.
